predictions.text: U.S. CPI excluding food and energy (core, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between +0.2% and +0.3% in the BLS release due mid-November.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the core CPI MoM (seasonally adjusted) value in the BLS CPI news release for October 2025. Outcome is true if reported core CPI MoM is >= +0.2% and <= +0.3%.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed inflation nowcast for Oct 2025 core CPI
High-frequency rent measures (Apartment List, Zillow) for shelter trends
Manheim Used Vehicle Value Index for core goods pressure
Gasoline and airfare price trackers for headline/core interplay
Supercore services (ex-shelter) trackers from private datasets
predictions.rationale: Shelter disinflation and soft core goods are offset by sticky services. A 0.2–0.3% core print aligns with recent trends and consensus.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-09 close to 2025-11-30 close, Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF (RSP) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 1.0 percentage point on an adjusted-close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close prices, compute [(RSP_end/RSP_start) - (SPY_end/SPY_start)]. Prediction is true if the result is >= 0.0100.
monitoring_signals: Breadth metrics (advance-decline line, % of S&P 500 above 50DMA)
RSP/SPY relative strength ratio
Positioning/CTA flow indicators for mega-cap tech
Earnings revisions breadth outside the top-10 market-cap names
Volatility and rates stabilization supporting cyclicals
predictions.rationale: Recent mega-cap underperformance and improving breadth favor equal-weight. Seasonals and rates softness can aid cyclicals relative to cap-weighted tech.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €35.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check official ICE Endex settlement prices for Dutch TTF front-month futures. Prediction is true if any official settlement through 2025-11-30 is ≤ €35.00/MWh.
monitoring_signals: European storage fullness and withdrawal rates
Weather forecasts (ECMWF) for NW Europe
LNG send-out, Norwegian flows, and French nuclear availability
Geopolitical risks on Russian pipeline flows
Front-month vs. spot spreads and implied volatility
predictions.rationale: High storage, mild weather risks, and ample LNG supply can pressure TTF, though geopolitical and cold snaps keep tail risks.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 4.25% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify daily DGS10 close on FRED or Treasury data. Prediction is true if any close through 2025-11-30 is ≤ 4.25%.
monitoring_signals: CPI/PPI releases and labor data surprises
Auction demand (bid-to-cover, tails) for 10Y/20Y/30Y
Term premium models and MOVE index levels
Fed speaker guidance on balance sheet and cuts
Risk sentiment and equity volatility
predictions.rationale: Seasonals, softer data, and risk-off flows could push yields toward 4.25% even without immediate Fed policy shifts.

predictions.text: NFIB Small Business Optimism Index for October 2025 will print between 90.0 and 92.5.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the NFIB Small Business Economic Trends report for October 2025. Prediction is true if the headline index is ≥ 90.0 and ≤ 92.5.
monitoring_signals: Gasoline and diesel price trends affecting small business costs
Labor market tightness (JOLTS, claims) influencing hiring plans
Credit conditions for small firms (NFIB credit availability subindex)
Sales expectations and inventories subindices
Government policy uncertainty from the shutdown
predictions.rationale: Sentiment remains subdued but stable amid policy uncertainty and tight credit; range centers around recent prints.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the U.S. Treasury’s OFAC will announce at least one new China-related sanctions designation via an official Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Validate on Treasury’s website: a press release explicitly announcing sanctions targeting PRC entities or individuals (e.g., surveillance, forced labor, illicit finance) dated by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Congressional statements and hearings on PRC human rights/technology
Commerce Entity List updates and BIS actions
Coordinated sanctions with EU/UK/Canada
Human rights observance dates and policy rollouts
Treasury advisories on PRC-linked sectors
predictions.rationale: Ongoing U.S.-China policy friction and routine cadence of designations make a November action plausible.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Google, Meta, Microsoft, or Amazon will announce a new transoceanic subsea cable project or named system capacity expansion via an official corporate blog or press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check official corporate newsrooms/blogs for an announcement naming a new subsea cable system or a capacity expansion on an existing named transoceanic system, dated by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Partnership announcements with SubCom, NEC, ASN
Regulatory filings/permits for landing stations
Hyperscaler capex outlooks and data center expansion plans
Regional bandwidth demand indicators
Geopolitical routing diversification (Arctic/Africa/India corridors)
predictions.rationale: AI-era bandwidth demand is surging; hyperscalers frequently announce new cable routes or expansions, though timing is uncertain.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or below 14.50 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify official VIX closing values from Cboe. Prediction is true if any close through 2025-11-30 is ≤ 14.50.
monitoring_signals: VVIX and SKEW levels indicating demand for convexity
Realized 10–20 day S&P 500 volatility
Macro event risk calendar (CPI, auctions, shutdown news)
Dealer gamma positioning and options charm
Credit spreads (HYG, HY OAS) stabilizing
predictions.rationale: If data are benign and shutdown risks fade, vol could mean-revert quickly; however, event risk keeps odds sub-50%.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. commercial crude oil stocks of +8.0 million barrels or more in at least one report published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check EIA weekly table of U.S. commercial crude inventories. Prediction is true if any reported week shows a change ≥ +8.0 million barrels.
monitoring_signals: Refinery utilization declines and maintenance outages
Net imports (seaborne arrivals) and pipeline flows
SPR transactions and adjustments
Gulf Coast weather/fog-induced port disruptions
API weekly crude change as an advance indicator
predictions.rationale: Seasonal refinery turnarounds and import volatility can produce outsized weekly builds, though such large prints are relatively infrequent.

predictions.text: TSA daily U.S. checkpoint throughput will reach at least 3,000,000 passengers on at least one day between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-01 (U.S. reporting dates).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm on TSA Passenger Volumes page. Prediction is true if any listed date in the specified window shows ≥ 3,000,000 passengers screened.
monitoring_signals: Airline published schedules and load factors for Thanksgiving week
FAA advisories and potential ATC staffing impacts
Weather forecasts for major hubs
Airline waiver policies and cancellations
Historical holiday travel records and TSA guidance
predictions.rationale: Thanksgiving typically sets annual records; capacity growth and pent-up demand increase odds of a new high despite potential operational headwinds.
